text:
Dirk Bernard Joseph (Dick) Schouten (25 January 1923 – 3 February 2018) was a Dutch economist. He served as Professor of General Economics and Economic History at Tilburg University. He was known for his work about macroeconomic modelling.
Schouten was elected a member of the Royal Netherlands Academy of Arts and Sciences in 1975.
Schouten died on 3 February 2018 in The Hague at the age of 95.

annotations.surface_form: Royal Netherlands Academy of Arts and Sciences
